ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 12 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories & Warranty, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Samsung DV150F 16.2MP Smart WiFi Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 1.5-Inch front and 2.7-Inch Rear Dual View LCD Screens (White)
32 Gigabyte MicroSD High Capacity Memory Card - Additional BP-70A Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery - SD USB Memory Card Reader
Compact Hardshell Digital Camera Carrying Case with Inner Pocket & Neck Strap - - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Full Size 50" Tripod w/Case - HDMI Cable for High Definition TV connection - Flexible Mini Table Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung DV150F 16.2MP Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and Dual-View LCD Screens (White) + BP-70A Battery + 10pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
